title: HOW TO MAKE BASIC CAULIFLOWER RICE
directions: Attach the shredding blade to your food processor and shred cauliflower. Or, use a cheese grater to shred the cauliflower by hand into a rice-like texture.
Add the coconut oil to a medium pan over medium heat.
Add the garlic and cauliflower rice.
Saut√© for 7 - 10 minutes, until cauliflower rice is tender.
Add salt and pepper to taste and serve hot.
ingredients: Sea salt and freshly-ground black pepper to taste
